abstracts.cdata!:
The Agricultural Credit Project is a
            credit program which will seek to raise agricultural
            productivity with a view to increasing food production,
            agricultural exports, and real farm income. It will assist
            to improve agricultural policies through the reduction of
            interest rate subsidies. The low-income producers'
            component will compromise about one-half of the total
            investment program. About 62,000 families or 350,000
            beneficiaries will benefit from the project.
